Smart Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush that can detect when you are not brushing your teeth properly and provide real-time feedback to improve your brushing technique. This toothbrush could also track your brushing habits and provide personalized recommendations for better oral hygiene.

Toothbrush Sanitizer: Design a toothbrush that can sanitize itself and your teeth in one step. This toothbrush could use UV light or other sanitizing technology to kill bacteria and germs on the toothbrush and in the mouth.

Customizable Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush that allows users to customize the shape, size, and bristle stiffness to fit their individual needs. This toothbrush could be made with interchangeable heads and handles to accommodate different preferences and mouth shapes.

Toothbrush with Built-in Toothpaste: Develop a toothbrush that has a built-in toothpaste dispenser. This toothbrush could eliminate the need for separate toothpaste tubes and make it easier to brush your teeth. The toothpaste could be a replaceable cartridge that is easy to swap out when it runs out.

Toothbrush with AI Technology: Create a toothbrush that uses artificial intelligence to analyze your brushing technique and provide real-time feedback to improve your oral hygiene. This toothbrush could use sensors and machine learning algorithms to detect when you are brushing too hard or not hard enough and provide personalized recommendations for better brushing.
